<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Gift of the Hoard](/Feats.aspx?ID=3754) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Aftermath" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=424" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 56</row>

**Prerequisites**
You have succeeded at an important task given by a [dragon](/Traits.aspx?ID=50), such as procuring a special treasure for their hoard.

</column>

---

In pleasing the cravings of a mighty dragon, they have deigned to impart some of their magical essence into your body. Your eyes begin to glow and change color while your limbs and neck grow a veneer of scales, all the same color as the associated dragon, accompanied by a near-insatiable desire to amass a hoard of your own. You gain the [_dragon breath_](/Spells.aspx?ID=499) sorcerer bloodline spell, emulating the breath of the associated dragon, and a focus pool of 1 Focus Point. If you already have a focus pool, increase your number of Focus Points by 1. You [Refocus](/Actions.aspx?ID=71) by counting and arranging your treasure.
